title: Demonstration in perception
creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy
brief_description: Presents some of the demonstrations in use at Princeton University, USA, for research in perception. Apparatus employed in the demonstrations includes: three chairs; size, brightness apparatus; overlay table; stationary trapezoid; rotation trapezoid; distorted rooms.
